title: Petal & Pup Women's Kelda Dress
description: mid length sleeves with elasticised cuff
gathered at waist with tie detail

Step out in style wearing this maxi length dress! Featuring a v neckline and mid length sleeves with elasticised cuffs, it's sure to flatter your figure. Functional buttons adorn the bodice, whilst being gathered at the waist with a tie detail for a fun take on femininity. Due to the relaxed fit of this dress, it is recommended if you are between sizes to select a size down.
